        public static byte[] encrypt(byte[] ivBytes,
             byte[] keyBytes,
             byte[] clearTextBytes)
                      throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                             NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             NoSuchPaddingException,
                             InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                             IllegalBlockSizeException,
                             BadPaddingException
        Parameters:
        ivBytes - Must be exactly 16 bytes. Can be openly shared.
        keyBytes - Should be "UTF-8" bytes.
        clearTextBytes - Clear text to encrypt
        Returns:
        Cipher text
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        NoSuchPaddingException
        InvalidKeyException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        IllegalBlockSizeException
        BadPaddingException
